title: Linux who Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux who command, learn how to use it, and discover practical examples to understand user sessions and system activity.

meta.title: Linux who Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux who command, learn how to use it, and discover practical examples to understand user sessions and system activity.
meta.keywords: Linux, who command, user management, system activity, session information, practical examples

verify.name: Verify the output of the `who` command
verify.hint: The `who` command should display information about the current user, `labex`.

steps.title: Explore the Output of the who Command

verify.name: Verify the output of the `who` command with multiple users
verify.hint: The `who` command should display information about both the `labex` and `testuser` users.

steps.title: Filter the Output of the who Command

verify.name: Verify the filtered output of the `who` command
verify.hint: The filtered output of the `who` command should show the username `labex`, the login time `2023-04-11 09:15`, and the remote host `(172.17.0.1)`.
